Title: Authorizes persons under the age of eighteen to participate in certain organized racing and competitive events involving snowmobiles
Summary: Authorizes persons under the age of eighteen to participate in certain organized racing and competitive events involving snowmobiles.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Amd ยง25.19, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to authorizing persons under the age of eighteen to participate in certain organized racing or competitive events involving snowmobiles
